job_title: OGIP Team Leader in Changsha, Hunan
pros: great teamwork atmosphere, lots of learning
cons: it takes lots of time and energy and no pay

job_title: Exchange Participant Manager in Shanghai, Shanghai
pros:
- I got to travel to India and Egypt, to work with two different projects at NGOs. 
- I help AIESEC participants match with projects all over the world, creating a great experience for them.
- You get to meet people from all over the world, travel, host others.
cons:
- Not payed. 
- Very disorganized since its managed by students.
- Pretty bad accommodation when doing my exchanges.

review_title: I never worked in the US AIESEC since all my experience is based in Shanghai. So I am not so familiar about it here.
pros: Worldwide connection. In AIESEC, you could have a wonderful exchange experience where you could visit many countries as you want. You could experience different culture there.
cons: sometimes without consideration. Since it is a student organization, they will do something purely derive from passion instead of rational.

review_title: This is a good place to develop leadership
job_title: Human Resources Manager in Changsha, Hunan
pros:
1.Excellent culture and environment
2.International team and energetic people
3.Working efficiency
4.Develop with the improvement of society
5.Professional team
cons: The company's update too fast.The longest duration for a position is about 1 year,which is not good at the stability development of the company but meanwhile it can provide opportunities for new genration

pros: It offered us the chance the experience leadership strategies. It also give us enough input to level the organisation up.
cons: Working at the organisation is quite time consuming, during the peak period you have to work overtime. People are too passionate sometimes.

pros: Develop human potential and contribute to my careers development. AIESEC can not give you anything but you can get a lot from AIESEC .
cons: No salary , no support from our schools (as a student association,do not have this support) ,sometimes also questioned by other people

relatively chill environment
not well structured SOW
